tool_description:
Multiple Social Networks - One API
Build applications & access data from the major social networks easily through our consolidated Social Discovery API.
name: Disco
title: Disco

api_list.name: Search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-disco.p.rapidapi.com/query"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-disco.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
